alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 07 at 1:32PM PST until March 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 7000 feet. New snow accumulations of 8 to 15 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start off as a heavy wet snow, with the potential for a mix of rain and snow between 7,000 to 8,000 feet. This will result in a heavy load of wet snow, which could collapse roofs.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
